codeLibrary

类 File

  • java.lang.Object
    • codeLibrary.File

  • public class File
extends java.lang.Object
    Description: This class is made to create a interface of a certain file
    作者:
    Yuelong

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      (专用程序包) java.io.BufferedReader BR 
      (专用程序包) int currentIndex 
      (专用程序包) int currentLine 
      (专用程序包) FileType fileType
      In order to ensure the speed of operation, the are three types of File class provided --- Read & Write, Read and Write.
      (专用程序包) java.io.FileReader FR 
      (专用程序包) java.io.FileWriter FW 
      (专用程序包) java.io.PrintWriter PW 
      (专用程序包) java.lang.String[] tempLine
      temperary words stored in a array
      (专用程序包) int tempLineIndex
      Line index associated with the tempLine
      (专用程序包) java.util.List<java.lang.String> text
      The String arraylist used to store the whole file temprarily, upon which the complex editions can be performed
              Preserved character | : line breaker,

    • 字段详细资料

      • fileType

        FileType fileType
        In order to ensure the speed of operation, the are three types of File class provided --- Read & Write, Read and Write. To ensure the availability is the default type;

      • FR

        java.io.FileReader FR
        另请参阅:
        FileReader

      • BR

        java.io.BufferedReader BR
        另请参阅:
        BufferedReader

      • FW

        java.io.FileWriter FW
        另请参阅:
        FileWriter

      • PW

        java.io.PrintWriter PW
        另请参阅:
        PrintWriter

      • text

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> text
        The String arraylist used to store the whole file temprarily, upon which the complex editions can be performed
                Preserved character | : line breaker,

        int currentLine

        int currentIndex
